Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2016 04:22PM Unomeklp wrote: I was diagnosed when I turne 47. Had stage 2 in my left breast. Had surgery,4 chemo treatments and 35 radiation. Now my cancer has returned and I've been diagnosed as terminal. Have started taking ibrance and femara. I am 50 now and have told my youngest..he's 25 and am at loss of how to tell my oldest , 29,who is incarcerated. Many say not to make him worry but I don't feel right in not telling him. Arrrrgh
Posts.Title: What and when to tell children Alex276 LisaMomOfFour
